H0.text: Who was the first US president Barbara Walters interviewed. Jimmy Carter

H1.text: Who was the first US president Barbara Walters interviewed. Gerald Ford

H2.text: Who was the first US president Barbara Walters interviewed. Ronald Reagan

H3.text: Who was the first US president Barbara Walters interviewed. Nixon

A4.text: During her career, Walters interviewed every sitting U.S. president and first lady from Richard and Pat Nixon to Barack and Michelle Obama.

A5.text: Her first guests included a joint appearance by President-elect Jimmy Carter and Rosalynn Carter.
